Train your body. Earn money. What could be better than having a monetization system for you while keeping your daily exercise routine? That is the beauty of pursuing a healthy lifestyle and side hustle at the same time. And with Runnow.io, “We Pay To Exercise”!

Android (APK)
WELCOME TO

Physical fitness is the prerequisite for a good state of mind and body.

We call Runnow.io mechanism “Exercise-to-Earn”, a modern concept of compound interest. Here’s how you can upgrade and earn while enjoying your exercise, and possibly, this can even give you a newfound sense of fashion!

Running

Whether you like jogging or running, we got you, with sneakers! The NFT collection mints carefully-designed sneakers, allowing you to freely select your preferred one that suits your aesthetic, capability, and condition, making your investment worth every penny.

Cycling

Cycling with Runnow.io is the new sexy. We design 4 vivid types of Bicycles, depending on your particular style preferences.

Swimming

As a "swimaholic", you can select one of the 4 available Swimwears with an array of style and body options ensure you can fully express your individuality.

AUGUST 2022

- Introduce KOL Character & Runnow Character
- Sell limited NFT Character / KOL Character Boxes (Buy by $RUNNOW)
- Introduce Land & Gem Sell limited NFT Land & Gem Boxes (Buy by $RUNNOW)
- Finish Wearable Device API with iOS & Android
- Introduce New Sport - Cycling
- Sell limited NFT Bicycle Boxes (Buy by $RUNNOW)
- Unlock Mara Runnow Mode (Running)
- Multichain Bridge
- GemUni Wallet Integrated

SEPTEMPER 2022

- Unlock Workout & Leaderboard Mode (Cycling)
- Unlock 1 vs 1 / Team vs Team Mode
- Unlock Daily Quest Mode (Stake, Exercise & Earn)
- Flexible Earning RUNNOW / RUNGEM
- New Anti-Inflation Mechanics
- Runnow SocialFi (GemUni Platform)

OCTOBER 2022

- Tour De Runnow (Cycling)
- Unlock Sleep & Earn Mode
- Unlock Donation Mode
- Introduce New Sport - Swimming
- Sell limited NFT Swimwear Boxes (Buy by $RUNNOW)
- Runnow DAO Version 1 (GemUni Platform)

NOVEMBER 2022

- New Anti-Inflation Mechanics
- Swim With Runnow Mode (Swimming)
- Runnow Man Mode
- Unlock all Modes for 3 Sports

DECEMBER 2022

- Unlock Catchup Runnow Go Mode
- Runnow DAO Version 2 (GemUni Platform)
- Introduce “Runnow Online Trainer Programme” - Learn & Earn
- Life Cycle & Revival

GemUni

Leaded by specialists in the blockchain industry, GemUni is a Decentralized Gaming Platform that is pioneering in the development of the first comprehensive gaming Metaverse.

K-Group Ventures

The major investment wing of K-group, a prominent technological corporation that is constantly striving to push Blockchain Technology globalization to the mass.
